Name: Italian Sun
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tastes rather like a bon bon (a round, sugar coated, lemon flavoured sweet).
History: Created in 2002 by Dan Spink at Browns, St Martin's Lane, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Italian Sun contains 127 calories
